main event: Two deputy sheriffs in Michigan had an unusual encounter with an unidentified flying object (UFO) in November 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as triangular in shape, around 200 feet wide and 30 feet thick, with a greenish-blue color and a row of red and blue lights around the perimeter. It also had four white lights in the middle.
The object was oscillating and moving about 300 yards away from the deputies at an altitude of around 1,000 feet.
The object accelerated and moved away from the deputies at a high rate of speed, disappearing from sight within about 10 minutes.
The deputies were not able to determine what the object was, as it did not seem to be an aircraft or any other known object.
Other reports of similar sightings in the area were mentioned, including by local nurses and a Detroit-area executive.
sighted object: a triangular-shaped object with colored lights
